resources.string: Access to the camera is needed for detection
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.
Ocr dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage

- Scan facing straight on, avoid reading at angles.
 - Works best in natural light with the sun behind you.
 - Avoid glare when possible,
 - Close proximity to the plate will give the best results.
 - Pinch to zoom if at a distance from the plate.
 - At night use the phones flash.

- Has trouble identifying the number 1 in certain conditions.
 - Screw covers on licence plate can effect scan accuracy.
